message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this exceptional product. It's a unique opportunity to acquire a one-of-a-kind item that I'm sure you'll find valuable. I'm willing to let it go for $12000.

Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate you bringing this product to my attention. While I find it interesting, $12000 is a bit higher than I'm comfortable paying at this time. I'm willing to offer $10000 for it. Let me know what you think.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand that $10000 is a bit lower than I was hoping for, but I'm willing to meet you in the middle. I'm now willing to sell the product to you for $11000. This is my final counteroffer, so I hope we can come to an agreement.
